QuestData.Title: A Visit With the Greatmother
QuestData.Description: The Greatmother has asked that I seek you out and deliver a message. She wishes to speak with you at once.$B$BMy will has been sapped but make no mistake, $n, if you anger the Greatmother, I will come down upon you with all the force that I can muster. She is in the main hall.$B$B<Garrosh points at the large building to the north.>$B$BListen to what she has to say and do as she tells you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Greatmother Geyah and listen to what she has to tell you.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Greatmother Geyah at Garadar in Nagrand.
QuestData.RewardText: We must first expand your mind so that you may commune with the ancestors.
